name: World's Finest Chef
description:
YOU ARE THE WORLD'S FINEST CHEF.

NOW GO! ACHEIVE YOUR DREAMS OF WORKING FOR THE WORLD CENTRAL KITCHEN (WCK).

This game was made for the Thankmas 2022 Charity Livestream Event.

Objective:

Make Ham, Cheese, Mayo Sandwiches for the residents of Flooreda after their major hurricane!

Controls:

Left-Click - PLUNGER

Right-Click - SPATULA

WASD - Movement

Mouse - View

Updates:

This game will be updated within the next few days for bug fixes, improvements, and more features! (Latest Update: First Release 12/4/22)
